description: Get the details for a previously initiated Earth Observation job.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the initiated Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: DurationInSeconds
nested_items.description: The duration of Earth Observation job, in seconds.

nested_items.name: ErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the errors generated during the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A detailed message describing the error in an Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of error in an Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role that you specified for the job.

nested_items.name: ExportErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the errors generated during ExportEarthObservationJob.

nested_items.name: ExportResults
nested_items.description: The structure for returning the export error details while exporting results of an Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A detailed message describing the error in an export EarthObservationJob operation.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of error in an export EarthObservationJob operation.

nested_items.name: ExportSourceImages
nested_items.description: The structure for returning the export error details while exporting the source images of an Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A detailed message describing the error in an export EarthObservationJob operation.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of error in an export EarthObservationJob operation.

nested_items.name: ExportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: InputConfig
nested_items.description: Input data for the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: PreviousEarthObservationJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the previous Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: RasterDataCollectionQuery
nested_items.description: The structure representing the RasterDataCollection Query consisting of the Area of Interest, RasterDataCollectionArn, RasterDataCollectionName, TimeRange, and Property Filters.

nested_items.name: AreaOfInterest
nested_items.description: The Area of Interest used in the search.

nested_items.name: AreaOfInterestGeometry
nested_items.description: A GeoJSON object representing the geographic extent in the coordinate space.

nested_items.name: MultiPolygonGeometry
nested_items.description: The structure representing the MultiPolygon Geometry.

nested_items.name: Coordinates
nested_items.description: The coordinates of the multipolygon geometry.
(list) ---
(list) ---
(list) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: PolygonGeometry
nested_items.description: The structure representing Polygon Geometry.

nested_items.name: Coordinates
nested_items.description: Coordinates representing a Polygon based on the GeoJson spec.
(list) ---
(list) ---
(float) ---

nested_items.name: PropertyFilters
nested_items.description: Property filters used in the search.

nested_items.name: LogicalOperator
nested_items.description: The Logical Operator used to combine the Property Filters.

nested_items.name: Properties
nested_items.description: A list of Property Filters.

nested_items.name: EoCloudCover
nested_items.description: The structure representing EoCloudCover property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_items.name: LowerBound
nested_items.description: Lower bound for EoCloudCover.

nested_items.name: UpperBound
nested_items.description: Upper bound for EoCloudCover.

nested_items.name: LandsatCloudCoverLand
nested_items.description: The structure representing Land Cloud Cover property filter for Landsat collection containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_items.name: LowerBound
nested_items.description: The minimum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover greater than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: UpperBound
nested_items.description: The maximum value for Land Cloud Cover property filter. This will filter items having Land Cloud Cover less than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: ComparisonOperator
nested_items.description: The ComparisonOperator to use with PlatformInput.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the platform.

nested_items.name: ViewOffNadir
nested_items.description: The structure representing ViewOffNadir property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_items.name: LowerBound
nested_items.description: The minimum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir greater than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: UpperBound
nested_items.description: The maximum value for ViewOffNadir property filter. This filters items having ViewOffNadir lesser than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: ViewSunAzimuth
nested_items.description: The structure representing ViewSunAzimuth property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_items.name: LowerBound
nested_items.description: The minimum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth greater than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: UpperBound
nested_items.description: The maximum value for ViewSunAzimuth property filter. This filters items having ViewSunAzimuth lesser than or equal to this value.

nested_items.name: ViewSunElevation
nested_items.description: The structure representing ViewSunElevation property filter containing a lower bound and upper bound.

nested_items.name: LowerBound
nested_items.description: The lower bound to view the sun elevation.

nested_items.name: UpperBound
nested_items.description: The upper bound to view the sun elevation.

nested_items.name: RasterDataCollectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Raster Data Collection against which the search is done.

nested_items.name: RasterDataCollectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: TimeRangeFilter
nested_items.description: The TimeRange filter used in the search.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The ending time for the time range filter.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The starting time for the time range filter.

nested_items.name: JobConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration.

nested_items.name: BandMathConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for BandMath.

nested_items.name: CustomIndices
nested_items.description: CustomIndices that are computed.

nested_items.name: Operations
nested_items.description: A list of BandMath indices to compute.

nested_items.name: Equation
nested_items.description: Textual representation of the math operation; Equation used to compute the spectral index.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the operation.

nested_items.name: OutputType
nested_items.description: The type of the operation.

nested_items.name: PredefinedIndices
nested_items.description: One or many of the supported predefined indices to compute. Allowed values: NDVI, EVI2, MSAVI, NDWI, NDMI, NDSI, and WDRVI.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CloudMaskingConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for cloud masking.

nested_items.name: CloudRemovalConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for cloud removal.

nested_items.name: AlgorithmName
nested_items.description: The name of the algorithm used for cloud removal.

nested_items.name: InterpolationValue
nested_items.description: The interpolation value you provide for cloud removal.

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: TargetBands to be returned in the output of CloudRemoval operation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: GeoMosaicConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for geomosaic.

nested_items.name: AlgorithmName
nested_items.description: The name of the algorithm being used for geomosaic.

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: The target bands for geomosaic.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LandCoverSegmentationConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for land cover segmentation.

nested_items.name: ResamplingConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for resampling.

nested_items.name: AlgorithmName
nested_items.description: The name of the algorithm used for resampling.

nested_items.name: OutputResolution
nested_items.description: The structure representing output resolution (in target georeferenced units) of the result of resampling operation.

nested_items.name: UserDefined
nested_items.description: User Defined Resolution for the output of Resampling operation defined by value and unit.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The units for output resolution of the result.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for output resolution of the result.

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: Bands used in the operation. If no target bands are specified, it uses all bands available in the input.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StackConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for a Stacking Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: OutputResolution
nested_items.description: The structure representing output resolution (in target georeferenced units) of the result of stacking operation.

nested_items.name: Predefined
nested_items.description: A string value representing Predefined Output Resolution for a stacking operation. Allowed values are HIGHEST, LOWEST, and AVERAGE.

nested_items.name: UserDefined
nested_items.description: The structure representing User Output Resolution for a Stacking operation defined as a value and unit.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The units for output resolution of the result.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value for output resolution of the result.

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: A list of bands to be stacked in the specified order. When the parameter is not provided, all the available bands in the data collection are stacked in the alphabetical order of their asset names.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TemporalStatisticsConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for temporal statistics.

nested_items.name: GroupBy
nested_items.description: The input for the temporal statistics grouping by time frequency option.

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: The list of the statistics method options.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: The list of target band names for the temporal statistic to calculate.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ZonalStatisticsConfig
nested_items.description: An object containing information about the job configuration for zonal statistics.

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: List of zonal statistics to compute.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetBands
nested_items.description: Bands used in the operation. If no target bands are specified, it uses all bands available input.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ZoneS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path pointing to the GeoJSON containing the polygonal zones.

nested_items.name: ZoneS3PathKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or an ID of a Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (Amazon Web Services KMS) key that Amazon SageMaker uses to decrypt your output artifacts with Amazon S3 server-side encryption. The SageMaker execution role must have kms:GenerateDataKey permission.
// KMS Key ID "1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab"
// Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a KMS Key "arn:aws:kms:<region>:<account>:key/<key-id-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab>"

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service key ID for server-side encryption.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Earth Observation job.

nested_items.name: OutputBands
nested_items.description: Bands available in the output of an operation.

nested_items.name: BandName
nested_items.description: The name of the band.

nested_items.name: OutputDataType
nested_items.description: The datatype of the output band.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a previously initiated Earth Observation job.
(string) ---
(string) ---
